sentence.Network_en: For some years Attila bullied Theodosius as he chose.
sentence.Network_cn: 好几年时间里,阿提拉故意欺侮狄奥多西.

sentence.Network_en: Attila struck terror into the people of Eastern Europe.
sentence.Network_cn: 匈奴王阿提拉曾令东欧人民胆寒.

sentence.Network_en: Let us see the treasures that Attila has brought us!
sentence.Network_cn: 来看看,阿提拉给我们带来什么珍宝!
